controls.control: The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets to protect them from security events
evidence: Audit trail of all access decisions

controls.control: The entity implements logical access security measures to protect against threats from sources outside its system boundaries
The entity monitors system components and the operation of those components for anomalies that are indicative of malicious acts, natural disasters, and errors
The entity evaluates security events to determine whether they could or have resulted in a failure of the system
The entity authorizes, designs, develops or acquires, configures, documents, tests, approves, and implements changes to infrastructure, data, software, and procedures
